replies.body:
{{champion:26}} BREAKING NEWS!!!! It seems that one of our fellow champions in League of Legends has been killed! What was once a beloved champ to many people is now gone, breaking the hearts of many who loved him. We will never forget you....Urf the Manatee. 

{{champion:40}} Ummm...

{{champion:26}} Yes? 

{{champion:40}} _whisper_

{{champion:26}} What do you mean Gangplank is dead? Don't be silly, I saw him alive and well a week from now. 

{{champion:40}} What? 

{{champion:26}} Yeah. Granted he seen better days and he lost an arm, but he still alive. Now Urf on the other hand, I saw him die myself yesterday. 

{{champion:40}} Urf been dead for years now. 

{{champion:26}} Really? But I saw him yesterday. 

{{champion:40}} And you saw Gangplank a week from now? 

{{champion:26}} Yes. 

{{champion:40}} I'm so confused now. 

{{champion:26}} How is anything I'm saying confusing? Just go back to reading the weather, not that I don't already know what going to happen. 

{{champion:40}} Oh like how it was going to flood yesterday and there wasn't a single drop of rain. 

{{champion:26}} But it did flood yesterday. 

{{champion:40}} There hasn't been a flood here for over 80 years. 

{{champion:26}} And now you know where I was yesterday. 

{{champion:40}} That's it! I'm done!

http://allenk.home.infionline.net/diff.jpg
Great story! But what is this about GP dying? (Please keep in mind I haven't played in a while. Just been coming here for Lightdragoon's awesome stories.)
This event...that has been going on for the past few weeks? GP has been disable in all game mode cause MF killed him?
Ahhh ok thanks.
{{champion:26}} Heh, I knew she would get pissed off
lol
Love reading these!
Signed in just to upvote this masterpiece!
In loving memory of Urf, he will be dearly missed
Its a she...{{summoner:13}}
{{champion:41}} Yar Har! I knew I'll be back! Fetch my cutlass! Get my arm! Find the orrrrrranges!

{{champion:41}} **HEY!!** You, yordle runt. Lend me a **hand** and get me my cutlass, pistol, and my oranges pronto.
{{champion:17}} Do it yourself old man, I am bus-**ohhhhh**
{{champion:41}} Yup.
{{champion:17}} I see what you did there.
{{champion:41}} Mmmhm.
{{champion:17}} No seriously that was clever....pretty clever.
{{champion:41}} But seriously get me my stuff you yordle kickball or I'll I send yah from here to Zaun.
{{champion:17}} Jeez, ok...**Crusty old nag bag.**
{{champion:41}} : OH! And dont forget to get the rum too!

A Flaw in the Code Part 11
Come one, come all. Summoners please hear
The truth about riot is finally clear
But first to understand, realize, comprehend
I must say the beginning, the middle, then end

Three humans, five champs all got off their bus
Just in each other lay all of their trust
Before the team was, the enemy’s base
The three’s long gone friend has lived in this place

‘til now, I have not told you our heroes’ names
Let’s start with the ones still alive-Mel, Josh James
And then there was Hel, his friends called him Bro
And finally Ao, who went down Tahm’s throat

Mel, Josh, James and the champs all walked in
To Hel’s home, where they met Ryze’s grin
“You plan to invade us alone? You eight?
I must say you heroes aren’t much more than quaint”

“The basement is where all the good champs reside
Try to resist us, and I’ll make sure they die”
The friends had an impossible choice to make
Shall they attack, with those live at stake?

Oh well. Bard didn’t care any more
He set up a portal….straight through the floor
By now, you know when the next part’s unveiled
My friend I will see you next Summoner’s Sale
In all honesty, who buys champions with RP? Oh, you do? And you? And... alright, I'm clearly outnumbered here.
When the 975 RP champs go on sale, yeah i might buy them.
Keep them coming lightdragoon I love reading your story`s and look foward to them everytime a sales come up! Have a good day everyone and good luck on the rift!
I thought I'd have at least a week to get money for Jade Dragon, dang it Rito. {{champion:32}}

Would be cool to buy these but... the whole can't connect to PvP.net server's is putting a {{summoner:21}}  to my spending habit's.
Thanks RITO for helping me save my money!!!

Wukong skin on sale, huh ?? 
well i guess that means we have wukong on sale in the next one .. lol riot

Does anyone know when Ekko will be on sale? I've been waiting for a long time with my 464 RP and would like to know when I can finally purchase him. If you know please reply to this comment or message me in game ;p : RektYouToday
When are ever going to put {{champion:268}} skin on sale i want to buy but i have not seen ever go on sale {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I can either get Wukong and buy this skin or I buy Gangplank and get a free skin. What do I do......
How about you get gang plank with rp and get the free skin then buy wukong and get the wukong as well depending on how much rp you have lol.
{{champion:38}} and {{champion:4}} in the next, please this month is getting longer than normal
Lol nice story
